last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Confronted with a crisis, Seok executes his endgame. 5-8 and Seol-ah team up to stop Cheonmyeong once and for all.

name: Black Knight
overview: In a dystopian 2071 devastated by air pollution, the survival of humanity depends on the Black Knights — and they’re far from your average delivery men.
tagline: The one hope to overturn the world.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: 5-8 investigates the construction of a new district in post-apocalyptic Korea. Sa-wol and Seul-ah experience an unexpected attack.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Seol-ah begins to investigate the recent tragedy. Sa-wol grapples with guilt. 5-8 discovers a dark scheme taking place in the shadows.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: 5-8 warns Seol-ah about the chilling facts surrounding her investigation. Sa-wol partakes in an intense tournament in the hopes of becoming a deliveryman.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Sa-wol advances to the final round. Ryu Seok reveals his disturbing plans for the upcoming migration, despite his father's opposition.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of Ryu Seok's ploy, 5-8 plans to take him — and Cheonmyeong — down. Having finally achieved his dream, Sa-wol takes up his first mission.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Confronted with a crisis, Seok executes his endgame. 5-8 and Seol-ah team up to stop Cheonmyeong once and for all.
